greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows in which row n lists prime factors of p^p - 1 where p = prime(n).
link: Sam Wagstaff, Factorizations of p^p - 1 for most p < 180
program: (MAGMA) for p in [ n : n in [1..100] | IsPrime(n) ] do "\nDoing p =", p; n := p^p -1; Factorisation(n); end for; // _John Cannon_
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 21 2007
